
 Seam Solder
 ${project.version}

 What is it?
 ===========

 a library of portable CDI utilities for use in developing applications,
 frameworks and other extensions based on CDI (JSR-299)
 
 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 artifacts/
 
    Provided libraries

 lib/

    Dependencies

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide.
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 Software License, Version 2.0 (ASL).

 Seam Solder URLs
 ================

 Seam Solder:           http://sfwk.org/Seam3/Solder
 Seam 3 project:        http://sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:             http://sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:                http://sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:           http://github.com/seam/solder
 Issue Tracking:        http://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/SOLDER
